_sText:
Take a look at the screen shots. first 3 screen shots are pictures of the map in night, and the last three are the same only in the day light version.
there is alot of stuff to check out.

this map is now a NIGHT MAP. it happens to be very fun night map. you dont stumble around in it like other night maps. it still has some light in it.

IT has a Small one person sky tram, and some more extras
BUTTONS are inside the towers that LIGHT THE LADDERS ON FIRE so you can watch some zombies BURN on the TV monitor inside!!
 you have to look for the button, they are hard to spot.

this map is very fun, and has alot of cool places to hide and defend from.

this is a edit of a day time phantom. you may want to check that one out as well.

its posted by me wing.


This was a map made by the GHS clan.
i edited it and created some extras like elevators and camera's.
ggodd2, clan member of ghs, gave me permission to edit the map.
this map may not be in locked servers.
